text: The Apertura 2007 Primera División de Fútbol Profesional season is the since its establishment. The first fixtures of the season were played on August 11, 2007, and the season ended on 2007. A.D. Isidro Metapán are the defending Premiership champions, having won their First Premiership title. The first goalscorer of the season was, who scored an against Once Municipal. ==Team promoted== * Nejapa F.C. ==Stadium== {| class="wikitable" |- !Stadium||Team |- |Estadio Cuscatlán || San Salvador F.C. |- |Estadio Cuscatlán ||Alianza F.C. |- |Estadio Nejapa|| Nejapa F.C. |- |Estadio Sergio Torres|| C.D.
